data.name: GRUNND Demo
data.detailed_description: 100% handcrafted adventure about traveling to a seemingly ordinary place, that slowly introduces itself as a surreal and twisted world that has it's own invisible gods, agendas, and order.
data.about_the_game: 100% handcrafted adventure about traveling to a seemingly ordinary place, that slowly introduces itself as a surreal and twisted world that has it's own invisible gods, agendas, and order.
data.short_description: 100% handcrafted adventure about traveling to a seemingly ordinary place, that slowly introduces itself as a surreal and twisted world that has it's own invisible gods, agendas, and order.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.8GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Enough to play music and speech understandably
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Multi-core 2.5GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Enough to play music and speech beautifully

data.legal_notice: No 3rd party visual or sound assets were used. Copyrights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: Light mature content that mentions alcohol and death.
